Texas Hammers

That's the adler advantage
Get a free consultation

Texas Car Accident Lawyer Get started on your FREE case review today!

There are many personal injury attorneys in Texas, but there's only ONE Texas Hammer®. Over the past 40 years, our team of lawyers has offered professional legal representation to those involved in auto accidents. Jim Adler & Associates will fight on your side and "hammer" the insurance companies, so that you and your family receive the compensation you deserve for your injuries, lost wages, pain, and suffering.

If someone’s negligence has led to your injury or the death of a loved one, the attorneys at our law firm want to help. Our personal injury and car accident attorneys can help victims find their most favorable route to financial recovery. Helping you get back on your feet is our mission. Locations in Houston, Houston, DFW, and San Antonio.

Get a free consultation
